title: Netflix continues foray into iOS gaming with ‘Exploding Kittens’ app and series
content:
Netflix has been continuing to expand into the gaming sphere for a while. Announced today, the streaming giant and card game Exploding Kittens are collaborating on a mobile game and animated TV series. Exploding Kittens – The Game is “an exclusive version of the beloved mobile game” and will launch next month.

more…

The post Netflix continues foray into iOS gaming with ‘Exploding Kittens’ app and series appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Netflix continues to expand into gaming. The streaming service and card game 'Exploding Kittens' are working on a new game coming in May.
